package com.Day1lab;

public class AllOperation {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		int number1=20;
		int number2=4;
		System.out.println("The addition of two numbers      :" +(number1+number2));
		System.out.println("The subtraction of two numbers   :" +(number1-number2));
		System.out.println("The multiplication of two numbers:" +(number1*number2));
		System.out.println("The remainder of two numbers     :" +(number1%number2));		

	}

}
